szakacs.kpi.fei.tuke.arena.game.updaters

Class AbstractGameUpdater

  • java.lang.Object
    • szakacs.kpi.fei.tuke.arena.game.updaters.AbstractGameUpdater
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameUpdater, ResettableGameClass
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GameUpdaterEnemies, GameUpdaterWalls

    public abstract class AbstractGameUpdater
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameUpdater
    An abstract base class partially implementing the GameUpdater interface for the purpose of storing and updating commonly used member variables.

    • Method Detail

      • startNewGame

        public void startNewGame(GameLevelPrivileged game,
                         DummyLevel level)
        Performs the actions to reset the implementing class to its default state when a new game level begins. This implementation should be called before executing code of an overriding method.
        Specified by:
        startNewGame in interface ResettableGameClass
        Parameters:
        game - the object representing the current game level
        level - the value object containing additional information to initiazlize the current game level
